name: Via Ferrata Baumes Corcades
description:
Introduction

"The most famous via ferrata in Catalonia, Les Baumes Corcades near Centelles, Osona is well known because of 70 meters Tibetan bridge."

"Various overhangs, long side sections and a 68 m Nepalese bridge make this a very demanding ferrata. The bridge, inaugurated in 2004, and the variant of the Tosquera route, in 2006, will challenge us."

"It is also possibly the most crowded of all"

Rating: K4
